name: Onsurity
description: Onsurity is India’s only healthtech company offering monthly, comprehensive employee healthcare to SMEs, MSMEs, startups, and growing businesses. We democratize technology, providing affordable products to ensure teams access top-notch healthcare. Onsurity empowers SMEs and enterprises to solve the major issue of affordable employee healthcare and benefits, increasing retention, productivity, attracting talent, and fostering a happier workforce.
Headline: Healthy employees, Healthy business!
ShortDescription: Get the best of insurance, healthcare, and wellness benefits, all in one place.

Highlights.name: Health membership
Highlights.description: In-app health check-ups, free doctor consultations, gym membership and more.

Highlights.name: Comprehensive Benefits
Highlights.description: Complete health plans where members can opt for group health, group term life insurance benefits.

Highlights.name: Digital & Paperless
Highlights.description: Members can contact Good Doctors – our dedicated concierge team during hospitalisation.

enhanced_description: Onsurity is an India-based healthtech company, launched in 2020, that specializes in providing monthly, comprehensive employee healthcare, insurance, and wellness benefits. It aims to democratize access to top-notch healthcare by offering affordable products primarily to SMEs, MSMEs, startups, and growing businesses. The platform helps organizations address the significant challenge of affordable employee healthcare and benefits, thereby contributing to increased employee retention, improved productivity, enhanced talent attraction, and a happier workforce. Onsurity provides a digital and paperless experience, featuring in-app health check-ups, free doctor consultations, gym memberships, discounted health check-ups, and complete health plans that include options for group health and group term life insurance. Members also have access to 'Good Doctors', a dedicated concierge team, for support during hospitalization.
ideal_company_sizes: Enterprises (globally relevant for their specified target market)
key_use_cases: Providing comprehensive employee healthcare and benefits
Administering group term life insurance benefits
Facilitating employee wellness programs (e.g., gym memberships, health check-ups)
Offering virtual and in-person doctor consultations
Providing support during employee hospitalization via a concierge service
competitive_advantages: India's only healthtech company offering monthly, comprehensive employee healthcare to SMEs, MSMEs, startups, and growing businesses (as per product data)
Monthly payment model instead of annual payments
Affordable products designed to democratize access to healthcare for businesses
Comprehensive benefits covering insurance, healthcare, and wellness in one platform
Dedicated concierge team for hospitalization support
primary_users: Employees (as recipients of healthcare and wellness benefits)
Company management (for improving workforce well-being and productivity)
